long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RightClick not only helps you get through work quicker, it helps you learn faster too. Not to mention scoring perfect grades.

By utilising the latest AI platforms, RightClick can assist you with a range of questions.  From multiple choices, to high mark essay questions.

Answer:
Perfect for multiple choice. Answer gives you the shortest possible solution in a matter of seconds.

Hint:
Need a quick memory jog? Hint will lead you to the correct answer without making it too easy.

Pointers:
Built for longer, higher mark questions. Pointer will give you the topics you need to mention or facts to recall.

Capture:
Drag and drop a selection over your question and get instant answers.

Stealth:
For those looking to get study assistance but keep it discreet.
